## neutralLayerL1Alt variable

Alternate darker color for L1 surfaces. Currently the same as card container, but use the most applicable semantic named recipe.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
neutralLayerL1Alt: ColorRecipe<Swatch>
```
